TopicTitle: Finally i i can play "Watch dogs" :D

Articles.Content:
I bought GTX 750 GPU ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) but i have some problem because my outdated CPU Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400 @2.66 Ghz ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Lt4Y9HJat6M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T06:56:08Z" title="03/15/2015 06:56  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by Pawelk198604**
you coul have used a four year old laptop. watch dogs awas grapicallly dumbed down on PC so that people did not realise (but they did) that 5 year old laptop > Xbox one
Te game is very boring. Lasts for less that 10 hours. Not worth it.

That's great, isn't it fun having a new GPU? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

To make watch dogs run better, i'd recommend downloading the [watchdogs config tool](http://www.nexusmods.com/watchdogs/mods/3/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fwatchdogs%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D3&pUp=1) and switching everything you can to the "PC" setting, also don't forget about updating those drivers .

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T14:09:38Z" title="03/15/2015 02:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by ZedNova**
